Text:
@geforce20 Not here, it seems EVERY disc get's recompressed to some single file format. I've even seen legit ISO's get deleted by site admins in favor of these recompressed converted torrents.

After all these years you figure someone would set a standard at some point that would be better than a DEGRADED version of the original image, when there is no problem or issue making a 1:1 copy of the original. It's like people don't want to release something as untouched as possible... they have to find some way of raping it with their e-dick.
